List available indicators

Source: R/indicators-core.R
list_indicators.Rd

Returns a character vector of available indicator names.

Usage

list_indicators(category = "all", return_type = c("names", "details"))

Arguments

category

Character. Filter by category: "all", "biophysical", "social", "landscape". Default "all".

return_type

Character. Return "names" (default) or "details" (data.frame with descriptions)

Value

Character vector of indicator names or data.frame with details

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Get all indicator names
list_indicators()

# Get details
list_indicators(return_type = "details")
} # }
